name: Hoop Stars: Dunk !
description:
Ready for Hoop Ball stars , Play against opponent and win against them , Best Tap game hoop stars Dribbbling . Celar Hoop Tournament Stars and hoop challenges
Dunk a lot! You have never played sport like this before! Feel the fun of true “reverse” basketball dribbling. Challenge the world and collect all the trophies!
Hoop Star is a one touch playable hoop game to Shoot the hoop in the ball ! Are you a hoop player ? Make as many buckets as you can in this fun hoop game!. Try to get as many hoop into the ball as you can. How many balls can you shoot get in the hoop ? Or take turns to see who can get the most in a row.
Invite your friends and share your scores.
